price: Hanga (fageenya) qabannaa gooboo (dagaanaa) lamaanii yookiin sana irra dhihoo ta’e. {2}
footnotes: {2} Kun fakkii dhihaatinsa Jibriil nabi Muhammaditti dhihaateeti ibsa.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
